```{r setup}
library(cleanETHPOP)

library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(readr)
library(reshape2)
```

Clean birth data

```{r message = FALSE}
setwd(here::here())
clean_births()
```

```{r message = FALSE}

```


